com.jde.view

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.view.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This Game class is the main OpenGL manager of the engine while playing the stages
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  Game.Collider
      This Collider class is a thread for the colliding() method

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean colliding(double ms)
      Check if the player has a collision in this frame
      protected void draw(int w, int h)
      Draws the full game, stage and HUD
      protected void forward(double ms)
      Forwards the stage, and checks if it has finished in order to forward to the next stage (if any)
      protected void initGL(int w, int h)
      Sets up the orthogonal projection in OpenGL
      java.lang.String toString() 
      static Vertex unvirtualizeCoordinates(Vertex v)
      This method converts a Vertex which points are represented with (0,0) as the center of the game board into "real" coordinates to draw
      void update(int w, int h, double ms)
      This method updates to the next frame, drawing and multi-thread collision detection are simultaneous; when finished, all entities go forward

      • update

        public void update(int w,
          int h,
          double ms)
        This method updates to the next frame, drawing and multi-thread collision detection are simultaneous; when finished, all entities go forward

        h - Height of the viewport
        ms - Milliseconds to forward

      • unvirtualizeCoordinates

        public static Vertex unvirtualizeCoordinates(Vertex v)
        This method converts a Vertex which points are represented with (0,0) as the center of the game board into "real" coordinates to draw
        Parameters:
        v - Vertex to convert
        Returns:
        A reference to the same Vertex already modified
